events.title: Maker Session - Wine Glass Painting with Kath (SOLD OUT)
events.body:
Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This Maker Session is a pair of painted wine glasses with a coastal New England Lighthouse theme, hosted by Creations by Kath! Wine and food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials, mock-tails and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class!

This is an all-ages event. Tickets must be purchased in advance.

events.title: Maker Session: Sea Glass Resin Art
events.body:
Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This Maker Session is a sea glass resin art piece hosted by Resin Galore & More! This class was a huge hit in June! Wine and additional food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials, mock-tails and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class!

\*\*Please note that the resin needs to cure overnight, undisturbed so the art pieces will have to be picked up the next day from the vineyard.\*\*

events.body: Don't miss out on the first comedy night at the vineyard. This is a 21+ event and tickets must be purchase in advance.

events.title: Vino & Vinyasa w/ Linda Vivino of The Studio
events.body: Get ready to uncork your potential with the Vino & Vinyasa class hosted at the vineyard by instructors from The Studio @ Mattapoisett Wellness Center. Whether you're a downward dog pro or a tree pose newbie, this series is all about savoring the sweet serenity of yoga in a vineyard setting. Tickets must be purchased in advance.

events.title: Pizza & Wine Pairing Event
events.body:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS A 21+ ONLY, RAIN OR SHINE EVENT. DUE TO THE FACT THAT THIS IS A PRE-FIXED MENU, WE ARE NOT ABLE TO ACCOMMODATE ANY DIETARY RESTRICTIONS.

Nasketucket Bay Vineyard brings you the collaboration of The Artisan Pig Pizza and Wine Educator Missa Capozzo of Wine Down Events for a guided pizza and wine pairing experience! During this entertaining guided event, you will learn how and why each wine complements each pizza, which will be served hot and delicious out of the oven. In addition, you will learn the fundamentals of wine and food pairing with fun, educational demonstrations.\
The Menu:\
1- Peaches, prosciutto, pickled red onion, and white base paired with One For My Baby Pinot Grigio\
2 - Golden Swine - Spicier Golden BBQ Base, Chicken, Bacon, Pickled Jalapeno, Blue Cheese Dressing paired with It Had To Be Your Chardonnay\
3 - Margherita - Tomato Sauce, House Mozz, Basil paired with Come Fly With Me Rosé

4 - Sausage & Ricotta - Sweet Sausage, Peppers, Caramelized Onions, Basil Pesto Ricotta paired with I've Got You Under My Skin Light Red Field Blend\
5 - Pig Pile - Sweet Sausage, Spicy Sausage, Soppressata, Bacon, Pepperoni paired with The Best Is Yet To Come Red Blend

This event will sell out super quickly. Don't hesitate to get your tickets! 

Limited bottle sales will be allowed for this event.

events.title: Maker Session - Beach Themed Resin Art
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a Beach Themed Resin Art Class hosted by These Two Crafty Chicks. Choose from three different project options: Charcuterie Board ($65), Trinkey Tray ($45) or Lazy Susan ($85)Tickets include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home. Wine and food are not incldued in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class. All ages are welcome for this event.

events.title: Vino & Vinyasa with The Studio Yoga Instructors
events.body: Get ready to uncork your potential with the Vino & Vinyasa class hosted at the vineyard by instructors from [The Studio @ Mattapoisett Wellness Center](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094819986187). Whether you're a downward dog pro or a tree pose newbie, this series is all about savoring the sweet serenity of yoga in a vineyard setting. Tickets must be purchased in advance and include a drink voucher to be enjoyed after your class in the vineyard tasting room.

events.body:
Join us in celebrating the close of another harvest season! Grab a photo in our grape stomp vat!

$5 cover charge. All ages welcome. Dogs allowed Outside

events.title: Wine & Seafood Pairing Event!
events.body:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS A 21+ ONLY, RAIN OR SHINE EVENT. DUE TO THE FACT THAT THIS IS A PRE-FIXED MENU, WE ARE NOT ABLE TO ACCOMMODATE ANY DIETARY RESTRICTIONS.

Nasketucket Bay Vineyard brings you the collaboration of [The Little Phoenix ](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063697864255)and Wine Educator Missa Capozzo of Wine Down Events for a guided seafood and wine pairing experience! During this entertaining guided event, you will learn how and why each wine complements each seafood dish, which will be served fresh off the food truck. In addition, you will learn the fundamentals of wine and food pairing with fun, educational demonstrations.\
The Menu:\
1- Mini Lobster Roll paired with One For My Baby Pinot Grigio\
2 - Fried Clams paired with It Had To Be Your Chardonnay\
3 - Scallops wrapped in bacon paired with Come Fly With Me Rosé

4 - Shrimp Scampi with I've Got You Under My Skin Light Red Field Blend\
5 - Stuffed Quahog paired with The Best Is Yet To Come Red Blend

This event will sell out super quickly. Don't hesitate to get your tickets!

***Limited bottle sales will be allowed for this event.***

events.title: Pumpkin Carving & Halloween Costume Contest!
events.body: Enjoy a day with the family at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard. Tickets must be purchased in advance for the pumpkin carving so a pumpkin can be reserved for your child! Parents, come dressed in your best costume and wine a bottle of wine! Prizes will be given for children's costumes as well. Reserve your pumpkins today!
